name: Alivewire
description:
Inspired by Hornet's silk from Hollow Knight, you play as a sentient wire with one purpose only — to bring the light back in the world.

Use WASD to move, press SHIFT to plug or unplug to a station, and LEFT-CLICK to shoot bullets and shatter glass walls to reach new possibilities.

Background music Blurred Lines made by pitbulljones on Newgrounds.
